thread.title: Australian winemakers drink up Chinese enthusiasm

title: Australian winemakers drink up Chinese enthusiasm
text:
Australian winemakers drink up Chinese enthusiasm 4:37am EST - 01:54 
Australian winemakers are cultivating connections in China, the world’s fastest-growing wine market, that are bearing valuable fruit even as entrenched European exporters are hitting headwinds. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Australian winemakers are cultivating connections in China, the world’s fastest-growing wine market, that are bearing valuable fruit even as entrenched European exporters are hitting headwinds.
